tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trivia_game (
    question_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    question_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    correct_answer TEXT NOT NULL,
    player_name TEXT,
    player_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE answers (
    answer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    question_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    answer_text TEXT,
    is_correct BOOLEAN
);
